--------------------------- ----------------------------

Yul Brynner leads this entertaining film romp. In 1904 Poland, a Cossack captain
takes horses from the Russo-Japanese War. The residents of the town rise up, goaded
on and coerced by a beautiful young woman.

Also Featuring: Eli Wallach, Jane Birkin, Oliver Tobias and Lainie Kazan.

Enjoy the movie!
